Class CustomScrollUI

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
javax.swing.plaf.ScrollBarUI
javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicScrollBarUI
FBLAQuiz.CustomScrollUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.LayoutManager, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class CustomScrollUI
extends javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicScrollBarUI

Custom Scroll UI Class

A custom scroll bar UI for a simple scrollbar that can fade in
Author:
Varun Unnithan
